articles.title: As a Black woman from the South, removal of Confederate symbols is personal
articles.description: Some people say Confederate symbols pay homage to Southern pride and President Donald Trump has defended Confederate monuments. But I got my first taste of the racist meaning behind the Confederate symbol when I was just 5 years old.
